name: PILLJUMP
description:
PILLJUMP is a short and simple platformer inspired by the game from Imphenzia's Unity YouTube tutorial.

How to run: setup using the setup file.

How to play: Colect 10 coins to spawn a portal to the next level.

Controls: A or left arrow key = Move left | D or right arrow key= Move right | Space or W or up arrow key = Jump | 

Powerups: Dash(The red arrow icon) :makes you move a little bit faster and makes you phase through white walls.

Super Jump(The green arrow icon): Makes you jump higher.

Please report any bugs and tell your ideas in the comments section.

Thank you!
